channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: Traffic Collision; INC#0958; 03:02PM; 17350 W Westbury Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Ss7LjR; #GranadaHills; Solo vehicle into the garage area of a 2,526 square foot one-story home, causing significant structural damage. No entrapment. Two adult females from the vehicle sustained minor injury, and are being taken to an area hospital by LAFD ambulance in good condition. No other injuries reported. An LAFD Urban Search and Rescue (USAR) crew is en route to assess, and as necessary stabilize the structure pending the arrival of an Inspector from the Department of Building & Safety (unknown ETA). Media Inquiries: LAPD Valley Traffic Division (Incident #2435) & Department of Building & Safety.; FS 18; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; E289 E87 E89 RA828 T89 UR88 UR89; CH8; 17; Brian Humphrey

title.a: Knockdown - Greater Alarm Structure Fire 01/21/2024 INC#0935

item.description: Knockdown - Greater Alarm Structure Fire; INC#0935; 03:10PM; 1136 S Alvarado St; MAP: https://maps.app.goo.gl/Wy6XcAx1HkoQtwNS9; #PicoUnion; 62 LAFD Firefighters took just 22 minutes to access, confine and fully extinguish flames that erupted in and heavily damaged a 4 vehicle carport (adjacent to and serving a two story apartment building at 1136 South Alvarado Street that was not involved with fire), before extending to - and being held by firefighters to the attic of a two-story residential fourplex to the east at 1137 1/2 South Westlake Avenue. No injury. Resident displacement yet to be determined. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 11; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC1 BC11 BC2 BC5 CM20 CM22 E10 E11 E13 E20 E210 E211 E220 E6 EM11 RA11 RA15 RA811 SO1 SQ21 T10 T11 T20; CH7; 12 13; Brian Humphrey

Greater Alarm Structure Fire; INC#0935; 02:48PM; 1124 S Westlake Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/4b6dnY5; #PicoUnion; *Address Tentative* PRELIM: Two story apartment building with heavy fire in the attic, threatening at least one other structure.; FS 11; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC1 BC11 BC2 BC5 CM20 CM22 E10 E11 E13 E20 E210 E211 E220 EM11 RA11 RA15 RA811 SO1 SQ21 T10 T11 T20 ; CH9; 13; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire - Now Out; INC#0470; 09:10AM; 1539 W Cambria St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3GqSauf; #Westlake; 54 LAFD Firefighters took just 42 minutes to access, confine and extinguish (9:52 AM) stubborn flames in an abandoned 8,988 square foot two-story residential fourplex (built 1900) that had fire through the roof on their arrival. No injury. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 11; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC1 BC11 BC5 CM20 CM22 E10 E11 E13 E210 E211 E9 EM11 RA10 RA13 RA813 SQ21 T10 T11 T9; CH9; 12 13; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire - Now Out; INC#1610; 09:50PM; 2829 N Future St; MAP: https://bit.ly/48HuttZ; #CypressPark; Firefighters responded to a one-story single-family home with fire in one room. It took 36 firefighters 15 minutes to access, confine, and extinguish the flames, keeping it contained to the room-of-origin. Crews will set up blowers to evacuate the smoke out of the building. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 44; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC1 BC2 E1 E201 E250 E44 E56 RA1 RA844 T1 T50; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1307; 07:14PM; 717 S Pacific Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3ObZKwZ; San Pedro; Firefighters arrived at a one-story commercial building with a small portion in the rear containing a second story office space (the last 15-20 feet of approximately 100 foot length was two-story). Crews made access from the rear alley where smoke was billowing out, and found heavy fire in the small second-story portion. Firefighters on the roof coordinated cutting ventilation holes in the roof with interior fire attack companies deploying hose lines below. It took 52 firefighters 41 minutes to access, confine, and extinguish the flames. No reported injuries. The cause of the fire is under investigation.; FS 48; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC1 BC11 BC4 BC6 CM20 CM22 E101 E112 E205 E238 E248 E264 E285 E36 E48 E49 E85 E95 EM1 EM11 HR3 RA112 RA36 RA848 SQ95 T38 T48 T5 T64 T85 UR85 UR88; CH7; 14 15; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1307; 06:33PM; 719 S Pacific Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3u225Uc; #SanPedro; Two-story commercial with heavy smoke showing. Offensive mode.; FS 48; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC4 BC6 E112 E248 E285 E36 E48 RA112 RA848 T48 T85; CH9; 14; Nicholas Prange

Hazardous Materials; INC#0869; 01:45PM; 625 E Anaheim St; MAP: https://bit.ly/4b0Xh1X; #Wilmington; Firefighters responded to a large (approximately 20-inch) pipe that was leaking an apparent petroleum product onto Anaheim street. Crews now have the flow shut down, and are working to contain as much of the product as they can, and protect storm drains and waterways. There is currently no widespread or escalating hazard to the public. Crews will remain on scene for an extended amount of time to assist with clean up.; FS 38; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC13 BC6 CM20 CM22 E238 E248 E294 E295 E38 E48 E94 E95 EM1 HM94 JT1 RA36 RA85 RA894 RA94 SQ21 SQ95 T38 T48 T94 T95; CH7; 12; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0829; 01:38PM; 6907 N Hayvenhurst Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/48HGUG1; #LakeBalboa; Firefighters responded to a commercial building where cannabis was being cultivated inside. An electrical issue appeared to have melted some items and caused smoke to fill a portion of the building. It took 34 firefighters 24 minutes to access and contain the threat. No reported injuries. ; FS 100; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC10 BC14 BC15 CM40 CM42 E100 E239 E273 E290 E73 E83 E90 RA100 RA90 SO1 T39 T73 T90; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0829; 01:14PM; 6907 N Hayvenhurst Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/48HGUG1; #LakeBalboa; One-story commercial building (with two-story portions?) with moderate smoke showing. Offensive mode.; FS 100; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC10 BC15 CM40 CM42 E100 E273 E290 E73 E90 RA100 RA90 SO1 T73 T90; CH9; 17; Nicholas Prange
